chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:

Dear Backmarket Team,
Unfortunately, I had to discover upon receiving my iPhone that the stated condition only partially applies. When evaluated as very good, the casing should only have minor micro-scratches.
The scratches visible on the images do not, in my opinion, match this description and are also easily recognizable from 1m distance.
I would be happy if we could find a solution here.

Thank you,
and
Best regards,
Alexander Resch

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We will make a partial refund of 60.00 € to the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Fabio from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Do let us know when you have partially refunded the customer and we take note of this. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
